discourse_list.title: [Proposal] Bring DAOs close to the average citizen, and let them open their eyes

content.content: With the last crash of bitcoin, cryptocurrencies have suffered a big dip. This has cause an incredible panic to retail investors and holders. It should not be like that as the block-chain technology has been accepted everywhere. Why not give a little push for the normal retail investor and give them a token reward with value, but only can be use in Gitcoin to help fund other projects? As the new individual starts learning, the reward would help understand the learner the potential for DAO in multiple areas to improve the world around us?
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is explaining their proposal to bring DAOs closer to the average citizen by giving them a token reward that can only be used in Gitcoin to fund other projects. A 3rd party could give constructive criticism or ask questions about the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: That’s a nice idea. I hope that the creators will see this suggestion
Thanks for your response, I will draft it properly and start spreading the rumor. We can start sharing this world for the average 9 - 5. Disruption started!!
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving positive feedback on proposal
